name: CocoCabanas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were perhaps the first paying guests last Christmas and stayed for a night last week.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: Jeff and Maria are wonderful hosts and Michelle served a remarkable Asian-inspired feast last Sat. night.
reviews.title: We love the CocoCabanas
eco cabanas - an eco-paradise that does not cost the earth
reviews.text: The wines were super, unlike most near El Careyes the rest of the week.

description: Solar Powered Beachside Inn. Elegantly rustic cabanas on the tranquil Playa de los Cocos, located on Isla de Navidad just outside of the world famous pueblo of Barra de Navidad.
